name: github-api-usage-monitor
description: Monitor GitHub API rate-limit usage during a job by polling /rate_limit

scripts.build: ncc build src/main.ts -o dist --source-map --license licenses.txt && mv dist/index.js dist/main.js && mv dist/index.js.map dist/main.js.map
scripts.build:post: ncc build src/post.ts -o dist/post-tmp --source-map && mv dist/post-tmp/index.js dist/post.js && mv dist/post-tmp/index.js.map dist/post.js.map && rm -rf dist/post-tmp
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:post && npm run build:poller
